div.head: 傷寒陽證
div.div: harm caused by cold with signs in the yang section

bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

entry.def: harm caused by cold with signs in the yang section

sense.def: Pathological Condition of shang han 傷寒 , harm caused by cold, with signs such as an exuberance of yang qi and heat. Shang han zheng zhi zhun sheng 傷寒證治準繩 7: 温疫之治與傷寒陽證相同 , “The treatment ofwarmth epidemics is identical with that of harm caused by cold with signs in the yang section ”.
